heading: 1.1.2 Tables
text:
Reference figure code chunk label fig: prefix, e.g., see Figure 1.1.
Similarly, can reference tables generated knitr::kable(), e.g., see Table 1.1.Table 1.1: nice table!
code:
knitr::kable(
  head(iris, 20), caption = 'Here is a nice table!',
  booktabs = TRUE
)
